title: 家下d洗衣店會唔會成為肺炎黑點？

replies.msg:
有都無用啦
你永遠唔知上一手咩人

My friend Risa cleaned the bathroom and did some laundry this morning. Her elder brother also did the laundry and hung it out to dry in the sun this afternoon. Her sister is hanging up the laundry in the sun. I'm gonna help her fold the laundry after it's dried out. They do ar least two or three loads of laundry each day. They have three washing machines and one clothes dryer in their laundry room. There are a pile of clean laundry waiting to be put away and a bundle of dirty laundry and a bag of laundry waiting to be washed.
